src:
Tega nočete vedeti
Tudi če mislite, da partnerja poznate do obisti, ne veste vsega. Veste, da tudi v zvezi še vedno masturbirajo in gledajo porniče?
07 Nov 2019, 07:47 by Katarina Golob
Večina ne pozna najbolj intimnih početij in želja svojih partnerjev.
1. Gledanje filmov za odrasle se nadaljuje
Ljudje, ki so, preden so spoznali partnerja, uživali v porničih, bodo to počeli še naprej. Ali na skrivaj ali pa s partnerjem. Starejši pari to hitreje sprejmejo, pri mlajših se lahko zatika.
2. Masturbacija se nadaljuje
Zakaj bi nekdo nehal masturbirati samo zato, ker ima partnerja? Težava nastopi samo takrat, ko zaradi tega primanjkuje seksa v odnosu.
3. Tudi drugi bodo privlačni
Zanimanje za druge ljudi, ki so za partnerja privlačni, običajno ne uplahne, le pozorno se umakne. Če obstaja zaupanje, se lahko partner ozira za komer koli, pa to ne bo spodjedlo odnosa.
4. Vroče, hladno, vroče, hladno
Vsak odnos ima vzpone in padce. Bližje ko si lahko partnerja prideta, večje so lahko razdalje med njima, ko se odtujita, prepiri so sestavni del odnosa. Partnerjeva jeza je na svoj, ne povsem pravi način le izraz njegove ljubezni, vendar se jo lahko nauči drugače kanalizirati, predvsem pa prepiri ne smejo biti žaljivi.
text:
You don't want to know that
Even if you think you know your partner to fruition, you don't know everything. Do you know that they still masturbate and watch porn in the relationship?
07 Nov 2019, 07:47 by Katarina Golob
Most do not know the most intimate things and wishes of their partners.
1. Watching adult movies continues
People who enjoyed porn before they met their partner will continue to do so. Either secretly or with a partner. Older couples adopt this more quickly, while younger couples may get stuck.
2. Masturbation continues
Why would someone stop masturbating just because they have a partner? The problem only arises when there is a lack of sex in the relationship.
3. Others will be attractive too
Interest in other people who are attractive to a partner is usually not frightened, but only carefully withdrawn. If there is trust, the partner can look at anyone, but it will not spoil the relationship.
4. Hot, cold, hot, cold
Every relationship has its ups and downs. The closer you can get to a partner, the greater the distance between them when they become estranged, quarrels are an integral part of the relationship. A partner's anger is not only a true expression of his love in his own right, but he can learn to channel it differently, and, above all, quarrels must not be offensive.
